text: the networking aspect of conferences is
huge and I know we have digital means of
communication but it's not quite the
same and the interesting thing that I
always find about attending conferences
and gophercon is a conference that you
know does this for me but lots of
conferences here as well as like let's
come out super invigorated and just
excited about something that I want to
just dive into when having those
conversations so yeah I think absolutely
if you can please attend if you can't
that's awesome too like we totally
understand we're in the middle of some
of the most challenging times for people
and everybody's situations are different
we recognize there's still risk in the
pandemic and we do our best to mitigate
that stuff as best as possible also kind
of recognize that like budgets for
companies to attend conferences and
stuff like that either through travel
restrictions or just budget slashing and
preparation for recessions and things
like that aren't there so like we hope
to see you in a future year but we would
love to get a bunch of people together
this year and I know I'm super excited
about just getting together in person
with other gophers
